arts.ttl: Jordan Henderson fumes 'I know the truth' in angry exchange over Ajax transfer
arts.sum: Jordan Henderson had attempted to force through a free transfer from Ajax to Monaco last week, but was denied by the Dutch giants, with the former England star now being questioned on his actions

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund reach total agreement with Ajax for Diant Ramaj
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund have this evening reached a total agreement with Ajax to sign Diant Ramaj for a reported €5m, according to Florian Plettenberg. The 23-year-old will undergo a medical on…

arts.ttl: Real Valladolid star on verge of Ajax switch
arts.sum: A member of the defensive ranks at La Liga outfit Real Valladolid is on the verge of a move to The Netherlands, with Ajax. That’s according to transfer insider Fabrizio…

arts.ttl: Eredivisie Round Up: Ajax win De Klassieker as AZ defeat Willem II
arts.sum: There were five Eredivisie matches on Sunday including Ajax v Feyenoord. Below is a round-up of all the action. Almere City 1-4 RKC Waalwijk RKC Waalwijk took advantage of a red card for Almere City to record a key victory at the bottom of the Eredivisie. Almere City took the lead in the 17th minute […] The post Eredivisie Round Up: Ajax win De Klassieker as AZ defeat Willem II appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: Dortmund finalize a move for young goalkeeper
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund are thinking ahead for the position of goalkeeper. Giant Ramaj will join the Black and Yellows after finishing the season at FC Copenhagen.

arts.ttl: Jordan Henderson lets rip at reporter as Ajax captain kicks off over Monaco move question
arts.sum: The former Liverpool captain had looked set to move to Monaco this month before a deal was axed

arts.ttl: Henderson snaps at transfer 'lies' after Ajax win
arts.sum: Ajax midfielder Jordan Henderson has hit out at "lies" over his potential transfer from the Dutch club to AS Monaco after his team closed the gap on PSV Eindhoven at the top of the Eredivisie.

arts.ttl: Jordan Henderson's net worth and Saudi earnings after second transfer U-turn
arts.sum: Former Liverpool skipper Jordan Henderson faces a difficult few months at Ajax after his unsuccessful attempt to leave for a January transfer saw him stripped of the club's captaincy

arts.ttl: Ajax boss makes definitive statement on Jordan Henderson after club block transfer for former Liverpool captain
arts.sum: The former Liverpool captain has only been at the Amsterdam club since January last year when he ended his underwhelming six-month spell at Al-Ettifaq in Saudi Arabia.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund open talks with Ajax to sign goalkeeper Diant Ramaj
arts.sum: According to Voetbal International, Bundesliga giants Borussia Dortmund have officially approached Ajax over the possibility of signing Diant Ramaj. The German goalkeeper is keen on the move, having featured just…
